deviceKnown.info.connectToComputer: Make sure your {deviceName} is connected to your computer.
deviceKnown.info.doNotDisconnect: Do not disconnect it until all operations are complete.
deviceKnown.info.pressContinue: Press the Continue button below when ready.
deviceSelection.videoLink.part1: Video instructions are also available for
operation.top.ledgerDeviceInfo: Perform the following actions on your Ledger
hint.certificate.delegation: Make sure the pool shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.certificate.delegationComplete: Confirm the delegation by pressing the right button.
hint.certificate.deregistration: Confirm the deregistration by pressing both buttons.
hint.certificate.deregistrationComplete: Confirm the deregistration by pressing the right button.
hint.certificate.registration: Confirm the staking key registration by pressing both buttons.
hint.certificate.registrationComplete: Confirm the staking key registration by pressing the right button.
hint.common.pinCode: If your Ledger device is locked enter your PIN, using the right and left buttons to select each number and then both buttons to confirm.
hint.common.CardanoApp: Highlight the Cardano ADA app on your Ledger and press both buttons.
hint.connect.exportPublicKey: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.connect.confirmExportPublicKey: Confirm exporting the public key by pressing right button.
hint.export: Confirm exporting the address by pressing the right button.
hint.hash: Make sure the hash shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.metadata: Confirm the metadata hash, then press both buttons.
hint.nanoX.connect.confirmExportPublicKe: Confirm exporting the public key by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.startNewTx: Check your Ledger screen, then press right button.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.startNewTx: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmValue: Confirm the ADA amount by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmAddress: Confirm the receiver's address by pressing both buttons.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.confirmAddress: Confirm the receiver's address by pressing the right button to scroll through the entire address. Then press both buttons.
hint.pointer: Make sure the pointer shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmFee: Confirm Transaction Fee by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmTx: Confirm the transaction by pressing the right button.
hint.sendTx.ttl: Confirm the time-to-live by pressing both buttons.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.confirmTx: Confirm the transaction by pressing the both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.info: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.path: Make sure the address path shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.address: Make sure the address shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.nanoX.verifyAddress.address: Make sure the address shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below. Press the right button on your Ledger to scroll to the end of the address, then press both buttons.
hint.warning: Accept the warning by pressing both buttons.
hint.withdrawal: Confirm the withdrawal, then press both buttons.
response.title: Response
hint.catalystStep1: Confirm the network ID by pressing both buttons.
hint.catalystStep3: Confirm to register Catalyst voting key by pressing the right button.
hint.catalystStep4: Confirm the voting public key by pressing both buttons.
hint.catalystStep5: Confirm the staking key path by pressing both buttons.
hint.catalystStep6: Confirm the reward address by pressing both buttons.
hint.catalystStep7: Confirm the nonce by pressing both buttons.
hint.catalystStep8: Confirm voting key registration by pressing the right button.
hint.catalystStep9: Confirm the auxilliary data hash by pressing both buttons.
